title: Nicotine while pregnant alters genes, study suggests

title_detail.value: Nicotine while pregnant alters genes, study suggests

summary: Researchers report that a possible cure for addiction may be found by following the pathways of significantly altered dopamine neurons in newborns who were chronically exposed to nicotine in utero.

summary_detail.value: Researchers report that a possible cure for addiction may be found by following the pathways of significantly altered dopamine neurons in newborns who were chronically exposed to nicotine in utero.
